data.name: Web Designer 10
data.detailed_description:
Present your Let's Plays, video highlights, character equipment or hard-earned achievements on your own website. With no programming necessary, you can drag and drop fantastic designs together exactly the way you want them. You can even set up a team calendar and forum with the help of widgets. Having everything in one place gives you more time to concentrate on what really counts. On top of that, you get 500 MB of webspace. So, in addition to real gaming websites, you can also start using Xara Web Designer 10 to make websites for your organization, school and career.

Homepages made easy.

  • Over 500 templates & design elements
  • Homepage designs including all subpages, graphic elements etc.
  • Simple integration of screenshots, Let's Plays und sounds
  • Logo design now even easier with Smart Shapes
  • Widgets for integrating YouTube, Facebook, etc.
  • Publish anywhere (FTP upload)
  • Website password protection
  • Includes 500 MB webspace 

Your clan. Your website.

Design your own clan logo.
Every guild, legion and clan is unique, and your logo should be too. Draw your own logo as a vector graphic right in the program. You can then drag it to make it the perfect size for your website, a team jersey or whatever you want.

Special lettering.
With Xara Web Designer 10, you're not limited to standard web fonts like Arial or Verdana. Simply choose the font that fits your needs.

Integrate Let's Play videos in Full HD
Show all your battle highlights in top quality. Integrate your videos in true HD quality at 1080p to retain realistic graphics and an authentic gaming feel.
 
Game report with image gallery.
Totally psyched about a new game you just tried out? Write your own report to share your experience with others. Thanks to the included gallery, you can accompany your report with fitting screenshots.

Password protection for secret agreements.
Websites don't always have to be public. You can hide your team plans and tactics from the eyes of the enemy by providing your website with a password in the MAGIX Online World

Important note:

This version of Web Designer 10 has been developed exclusively for Steam. For this reason, templates and content that have been additionally purchased from the MAGIX or XARA shop cannot be used. We apologize for this inconvenience.

data.short_description: Make your own gaming website – uncomplicated and unique. Whether for MMORPG guilds and legions, tactical shooter clans or casual after-work gaming, with the right website, you can get your people organized, beat the competition and show the world who you are.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP | Vista | 7 | 8
  • Processor: 700 Mhz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution of 1024x600
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 580 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal sound card
  • Additional Notes: Supported formats Import: JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIFF, PSD, HTML, PDF, HTM, WMF, RTF, MPEG-4, SWF, H.264 with automatic embedding°as video player, etc. Export: HTML, HTM, JPEG, PNG, WMF, GIF, PSD etc.
